body_html:
This question is better asked on StackOverflow since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there.

That said, see this particular StackOverflow answer. The equivalent to TensorFlow.loadLibrary() in Java mentioned there is TF_LoadLibrary in the C API.

Hope that helps.

This question is better asked on StackOverflow since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there.

body:
This question is better asked on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there.

That said, see [this particular StackOverflow answer](https://stackoverflow.com/a/47277367). The equivalent to `TensorFlow.loadLibrary()` in Java mentioned there is [`TF_LoadLibrary`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/3b85959a57ef2656cdcf2cfac62d68713948ba54/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L1526) in the C API.

Hope that helps.
